speaker: Abe Omorogbe
title: Edit and run Jupyter notebooks without leaving Azure Machine Learning studio
description:
Notebooks in Azure ML Studio is a new first in-class notebook authoring experience packed with features that make it easier to create, edit and collaborate on machine learning notebooks and files directly in Studio UI.
